title: Project Information
description: Fill & cross-check the publishable project .metadata information

title: Run Script
description: Run & display settings of application & settings

title: Project Directory
description: Cross-check folders, files and root directory structure of the project

title: README
description: Describe your project and the usage in the README.md file.

title: Run Tests
description: Auto-run functionality and stability test of the project

title: Debug
description: Track, highlight and suggest fix for debug warnings and errors

title: Security
description: Check project integration, interaction, privacy and data flow securities.

title: Git Repository
description: Push your project securily to a git repository

title: Package Repository
description: Publish your project to a package repository and marketplaces
